Galician parliamentary corpus ParlaMint-ES-GA-en, 2017-05-24-DSPG030.ana [ParlaMint-en.ana SAMPLE]
Diario de Sesións do Parlamento de Galicia
Minutes of the Assembly of the Galician Parliament

respStmt.resp: Data retrieval, TEI conversion and coordination
Machine translation to English and linguistic analysis of the translation

funder.orgName: Instituto da Lingua Galega, Universidade de Santiago de Compostela
Galician Language Institute, University of Santiago de Compostela
Proxecto Nós: O galego na sociedade e economía da intelixencia artificial (2021-CP080), convenio entre a Xunta de Galicia e a Universidade de Santiago de Compostela
Nós: Galician in the society and economy of artificial intelligence (2021-CP080), agreement between Xunta de Galicia and the University of Santiago de Compostela

availability.p: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License

bibl.title: Diario de Sesións do Parlamento de Galicia

projectDesc.p: ParlaMint is a project that aims to (1) create a multilingual set of comparable corpora of parliamentary proceedings uniformly encoded according to the ParlaMint encoding guidelines, covering the period from 2015 to mid-2022; (2) add linguistic annotations to the corpora and machine-translate them to English; (3) make the corpora available through concordancers; and (4) build use cases in Political Sciences and Digital Humanities based on the corpus data.

prefixDef.p: Private URIs with this prefix point to aligned source elements of the MTed corpus.

revisionDesc.change: Tomaž Erjavec: Generate TEI version of MTed corpus.

div.note: The session is resumed at ten in the morning.
Ends the session at five and fifty-seven minutes in the evening.
